titlestmt.title: Description of Center for Advanced Judaic Studies Library, Halper 179: Prayer book, Taḥanun

publicationstmt.publisher: Center for Advanced Judaic Studies Library

notesstmt.note: An incipit, marking the beginning of the paragraph that starts הפותח יד, in enlarged characters above a space; The folio contains a fragment from the regular Taḥanun supplications, parallel to, in the published version of Seder Rav ʻAmram Gaʾon zal / Naḥman Nathan Coronel [ed.]. Warsaw, 1865, p. 20, ll. 11-22.
Condition: nearly complete; verso is stained.

msidentifier.repository: Center for Advanced Judaic Studies Library

layoutdesc.layout: Columns: 1; lines: 10; ruling method: left rule justified by stretching characters.

history.provenance: Cairo Genizah Collection (University of Pennsylvania. Center for Advanced Judaic Studies. Library).
